author: Amazon Customer

review: I have a Chrome Cast and the Amazon Fire TV Stick is 20 times better! I have never lost a connection,  I do not have to worry about getting up to go to my device to change the movie, or when I answer my phone to lose the connection- I have literally lost a connection on the Chrome Cast so many times I just turned off the TV and put the thing in a drawer. The Fire TV stick  with the remote is all you need!  Now if those cable TV Apps were made free or have a flat rate then it would be world changing!
author: Enid Fire

review: The jury is still out for us on the Amazon Fire TV Stick.  We have run into some problems with it being connected to our WiFi.  Sometimes it works great, and other times we can't even get it to work, despite other devices in the house working just fine.  Based on some internet searching, it appears I am not the only person having this problem.  However, when it does work properly, I have been impressed and I really like having the option of watching Amazon prime shows on my non-smart TV.  But for the connectivity issues, I would be giving this a 5.  But when the issues are there, it is extremely frustrating and my rating drops significantly.
